name: Super (Basic) Hexagon #GM20 Jam
description:
This game was made in 20 lines of code for GameMaker's 20th anniversary game jam!

As the theme of the jam was '20', I decided to take the jam's recommendation and use only 20 lines of code to make a game using GameMaker Studio 2.

Using this limitation, I created a super simple clone of Super Hexagon, a game created by Terry Cavanagh, that can be found here:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/221640/Super_Hexagon/

Controls:

Keyboard:

  • Left and Right arrow keys - Move
  • Spacebar - Start / Restart

Controller:

  • Left stick / D-pad / Left and Right bumpers / Left and Right triggers - Move
  • A button - Start / Restart
